493 def log_token_event(
494     event_type: str,
495     username: str = None,
496     token_type: str = "access",
497     request: Request = None,
498     **kwargs,
499 ):
500     """Log token-related events"""
501     event_map = {
502         "created": SecurityEventType.TOKEN_CREATED,
503         "validated": SecurityEventType.TOKEN_VALIDATED,
504         "expired": SecurityEventType.TOKEN_EXPIRED,
505         "invalid": SecurityEventType.TOKEN_INVALID,
506     }
507 
508     security_event_type = event_map.get(event_type, SecurityEventType.TOKEN_VALIDATED)
509     severity = (
510         SecuritySeverity.MEDIUM
511         if event_type in ["expired", "invalid"]
512         else SecuritySeverity.LOW
513     )
514     success = event_type in ["created", "validated"]
515 
516     security_logger.log_security_event(
517         event_type=security_event_type,
518         severity=severity,
519         username=username,
520         success=success,
521         message=f"Token {event_type}: {token_type} token for user {username}",
522         request=request,
523         token_type=token_type,
524         **kwargs,
525     )
